page.title: 02LEYBURN LIFE
page.content: The Leyburn Life is a local leaflet that people in leyburn get monthly it is free to Bellerby as well.It generally tells you whats going on in Leyburn itself. This months (June) mentions the new chairman of the Leyburn Parish Council Mr John Dale.Also the Scout Group is congratulated on completing their sponsored walk last month.Other children are also congratulated on passing their gold swimming badge.Leyburn August Bank Holiday Fayre will have an increased space this year.A coffee morning will be held in St.Matthews church grounds, Family Service at St. Matthews church, and outings have been arranged also. Altogether the Leyburn Life is a very helpful booklet to people who don't get local papers.
